verses.roman:
bhikṣā kari' mahāprabhu viśrāma karila
miśra prabhura śeṣa-pātra sanātane dila

synonyms: bhikṣā kari'—after taking His lunch; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; viśrāma karila—took rest; miśra—Tapana Miśra; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śeṣa-pātra—the plate of remnants; sanātane dila—delivered to Sanātana.
translation: After eating, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took rest for a while. Tapana Miśra then gave Sanātana Gosvāmī the remnants of food left by Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
